displayName.text: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts

formattedAddress: Lincoln Center Plaza, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: Lincoln Center Plaza, New York, NY 10023, USA

editorialSummary.text: Multi-venue complex home to many prominent groups like Metropolitan Opera & New York City Ballet.

originalText.text: pressive show and extremely talented actors omg they were all unbelievableüò≥üôåüèæ. The venue was packed and cold but after entering the building honestly you would forget all about that. They had lots of places to take pics and videos and the artwork was very very detailed and very beautifully done. I would highly recommend anyone and everyone to visit whenever they are in town and if the Big Apple Circus üé™ is open because I believe it‚Äôs a seasonal event but I‚Äôm not sure, you can Google it just to be sure and for more info. The bathroom was outdoors though and it was freezing in NYC that day so bear in mind that you will need a nice jacket to keep you warm.  My daughter is 12 and she was very happy with the show from start to finish. It‚Äôs a very kid friendly show that parents along with their children will definitely enjoy watching. There‚Äôs also a concession area where you can take pics, buy food and gifts and merchandise from the show. You will also see the actors walking by in the concession area (picnic area) where they would take pics with the kids or anyone who asks for a photo. The actors were very nice and social and the staff were very professional and helpful. Enjoyed every minute of this experience and recommend everyone to go see it especially with the kids. You will enjoy it.

originalText.text:
Gorgeous opera house, known to be a top 10 in the world.

Modern architecture with beautiful light fixtures. Clear view of the stage from any seat in Orchestra. No dress code, but many people are dressed up. Fun night.

originalText.text:
Watching The Nutcracker at the Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts was fantastic. It wasn‚Äôt just the ballet that was great but also the hall and the environment.
The event was very well organized and it‚Äôs a classy place. We went to see The Nutcracker in December of 2023 and it didn‚Äôt disappoint.
I would definitely recommend you checking out any events that are taking place .

originalText.text: Went to a 2pm ballet in December‚Ä¶ The Nutcracker. Nice that there were plenty of restrooms and elevator to reach the 4th floor. Small bars with limited soft drinks, water, beer and wine are located on each floor. Note that you cannot take anything other than water into the theater.

originalText.text: The Geffen at Lincoln Center is impressive. Enjoyed a fantastic performance in a top-notch venue. Comfortable seating, great acoustics. A cultural highlight for anyone appreciating the arts. Definitely recommend a visit.
